data.question: What is Bootstrap?
data.options1: A front-end framework for developing responsive websites
data.options2: A back-end framework for server-side applications

data.question: Which company developed Bootstrap?
Which CSS preprocessor is supported by Bootstrap?
What does the class 'col-md-4' in Bootstrap do?
data.options1: Creates a column that spans 4 out of 12 columns on medium screens
data.options2: Creates a column that spans 4 out of 12 columns on large screens
data.options3: Creates a column that spans 4 out of 12 columns on small screens
data.options4: Creates a column that spans 4 out of 12 columns on extra-large screens

data.question: Which class is used to create a button with rounded corners in Bootstrap?
How do you create a responsive image in Bootstrap?
data.options1: Add the class 'img-responsive' to the image
data.options2: Add the class 'responsive-img' to the image
data.options3: Add the class 'img-fluid' to the image
data.options4: Add the class 'img-resize' to the image

data.options1: Creates a block-level button that spans the full width of its parent
data.options2: Creates a button that is vertically aligned
